Name: Locus
Description: Each locus has a unique sequence ID number from GenBank. It allows you to identify and retrieve that specific sequence record.
Units: Unique ID Number given by GenBank

Name: Collection_Date
Description: The date the sample was collected. The date is stored as a character string formatted to the ISO 8601 standard (YYYY-MM-DD), ensuring consistency and ease of data analysis later on.

Name: Sequence
Description: This is the contiguous DNA sequence of the Cytochrome Oxidase 1 (CO1) gene region. It was obtained using a CO1 primer.

Name: Sampling_Location
Description: The geographic region where the sample was collected.

Name: Species
Description: This is the species name the person who uploaded the locus sequence defined the species as.
